title: VIC Issuance Request (VIC-IR)
description: Used by a project developer to request the issuance of a Verified Impact Certificate (VIC) from the Independent Impact Standards Body.

id_msg_pred_drmr.title: Message ID of DR-MR
id_msg_pred_drmr.description: Message ID of the 'Document Review: Monitoring Report' (DR-MR) that approved the project's 'Monitoring Report' (MR) for the monitoring period in question:

url_ipfs_pred_drmr.title: IPFS URL of DR-MR
url_ipfs_pred_drmr.description: IPFS URL of the 'Document Review: Monitoring Report' (DR-MR) that approved the project's 'Monitoring Report' (MR) for the monitoring period in question:

summary_impact.title: Impact Summary
summary_impact.description: The impact, as per the verified monitoring report:

id_acc_h.title: Account for Cetificate Issuance
id_acc_h.description: Hedera account to issue the Verified Impact Certificate (VIC) to:
